text:
Ursula Karusseit (2 August 1939 – 1 February 2019) was a German actress. She was born in Elbing, West Prussia, Nazi Germany. Karusseit was known for her roles in "Ways across the Country" and in "KLK Calling PTZ – The Red Orchestra".
Karusseit died of heart disease in Berlin on 1 February 2019, aged 79.

annotations.surface_form: KLK Calling PTZ – The Red Orchestra
